title: Family stay in August 2020
text: An excellent location by one of the best beaches in Corfu. Efficient management always responded to our requests. A bit old facilities and furniture but overall a positive experience. Truly amazing views from the balcony.

title: Excellent family lunch on a hot day in Rio
text: A truly excellent restaurant in Rio, Patras. Service was truly polite, professional and efficient. Food was truly amazing with local fresh ingredients. An excellent value for money. Not to be missed!

title: OK for a family dinner in Skiathos town
text: Family dinner in August. Polite staff, average food as compared to other eateries in the island. Big plus is the location in Skiathos town by the sea.

title: A truly amazing place
text: Stayed there in August 2020 for a week. Immaculate rooms nice swimming pool clean and tidy throughout the hotel. The views are really astonishing overlooking Skiathos town and the nearby beach of Megali Ammos. The owners Tassos and Sotiris are extremely polite and always eager to serve their customers with their local knowledge. A really hearty breakfast is served in the open air restaurant/bar. A definite jewel in the island of Skiathos, highly recommended for families and couples alike.
